运动干预降低了多种药物的老年妇女的跌倒风险东部芬兰大学和库皮奥大学医院的一项新研究表明，针对老年妇女的运动干预措施成功地减少了瀑布。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/cersercise-intervention-redces-fall-fall-risk-in-risk-in---in-elderly-women-women-women-women-melultiple-medications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/cercise-intervention-redeces-fall-fall-risk-in-risk-in---in-----in-------------------------------------------------------------------- saspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=039381B4-85A2-4341-4341-8DC8-080E77755AC69 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 07:14:21 -0400 Exercise intervention reduces fall risk in elderly women on multiple medications
自我采样可以减少宫颈筛查的差异曼彻斯特大学专家的新研究表明，在现有的“涂片测试”以及现有的“涂片测试”同时，引入了一项英国范围内的自我采样计划，这可能有助于消除当前大多数宫颈筛查的障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/self-sampling-could-redies-disparities-in-cervical-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/self-sampling-could-redies-disparities-in-cervical-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98b648bd-7e48-48-48-4f2c-aaf2-0117bc2ac5eb Tue, 11 Mar 2025 07:07:00 -0400 Self-sampling could reduce disparities in cervical screening

与儿童亲社会行为有关的海鲜消费一项新研究显示，在7岁时食用最少的海鲜的儿童在7岁和9岁时可能比经常食用海鲜的儿童少于“亲社会”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/seafood-consumption-linked-to-prosocial-behavior-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/seafood-consumption-linked-to-prosocial-behavior-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1D27B3E8-91BD-4547-8C88C88-DBC72AD8FF38 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 07:03:00 -0400 Seafood consumption linked to prosocial behavior in children
